item.title: Book Review of Einstein: His Life and Universe
item.description: I recently finished this book Einstein: His Life and Universe by Walter Isaacson. And here are my thoughts on the book. It’s a book that brings the image of Einstein to life. Although the book is a biography, it makes a reasonable effort in explaining the physics behind his theories of relativity, photoelectric effect and quantum physics. Physics in the book can be intimidating to someone coming from the non-Scientific background.
